title: ARABIC MEDIUM
utme_requirements: SSC credit passes to include English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Christian Religious Studies/Islamic Studies and any other subjects.
subjects: Arabic and two (2) subjects from Arts/Social Science

title: ARABIC/ECONOMICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic and two (2) of Economics, Government, Geography and Social studies.
subjects: Arabic, Economics and any other Social Science subject.

title: ARABIC/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Geography and any other subject
subjects: Arabic, Geography and any other Social Science subject.

title: ARABIC/ISLAMIC STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, Islamic Studies and any other Arts subject.

title: ARABIC/POLITICAL SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Government/History and any other subject.
subjects: Arabic, History/Government and any other Arts subject.

title: ARABIC/SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic and two (2) of Economics, Government, Geography and Social studies
subjects: Arabic and any two (2) of Geography, History/ Government and Economics.

title: ARABIC/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Arabic, Yoruba and any other subject
subjects: Arabic, Yoruba and any other Arts subject.

title: BIOLOGY/GEOGRAPHY
utme_requirements: Five (5)SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Geography and any other Science/Social Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Geography and any other from Science/Social Science subject.

title: BIOLOGY/INTEGRATED SCIENCE
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.
subjects: Biology, Chemistry/Physics and any other Science subject.

title: BIOLOGY/MATHEMATICS
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes, in English Language, Mathematics, Biology, and any other two (2) Science subjects.
subjects: Mathematics, Biology and any other Science subject.

title: BUSINESS EDUCATION
utme_requirements:
SSC credit passes or TC II merits in English Language and any three (3) of:

1. Economics

2. Accounts

3. Government

4. Geography

5. History

6. Business Method

7. Statistics

8. Commerce

9. Any Science subjects

 

NB: GROUP A:

Commercial Arithmetic Costing, Principles of Accounts, Book Keeping Mathematics, Statistics.

 

GROUP B:

Office Practice, Business Method, Commerce, Economics.
subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any of Geography, Commerce and Principles of Accounts.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES / SOCIAL STUDIES
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies and any other two (2) of Economics/Commerce, Government/History, Government/Social Studies.
subjects: Christian Religious Studies and any other of History/Government, Geography, Social Studies, Economics/Commerce.

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/ENGLISH

title: CHRISTIAN RELIGIOUS STUDIES/YORUBA
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Christian Religious Studies, Yoruba, and any other subject.
